price: 18. (Maryam) waxay tidhi: Anigu Waxaan kaa magan galay Naxariistaha (Alle, ee iga dheerow) haddaad tahay mid dhowrsada.
arabic: قَالَتۡ إِنِّيٓ أَعُوذُ بِٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِ مِنكَ إِن كُنتَ تَقِيّٗا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: qālat innī aʿūdhu bil-raḥmāni minka in kunta taqiyyan
